resources.string:
CEBU CFI Community Cooperative and PITAM Transport Cooperative launch 38 Modern Jeepneys for Cebu City.


 The Cebu CFI Community Cooperative launches the 38 Foton Euro 4 Modern Jeepneys and turns over to Pit-os, Mandaue Transport Cooperative (PITMACO) on, February 18, 2021, at the Cebu Provincial Capitol Grounds.


 PITAMCO's modern jeepneys have standard and adjustable seating, expanded vehicle height, air condition, CCTV, BEEP AFCS (Automatic Fare Collection System), GPS, and Wi-Fi,
